TopicTitle: Kerbal Engineer Redux HUD not appearing

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I've installed the Kerbal Engineer Redux mod some time ago.

I always have the Construction helptool while building in the VAB and SPH, so the mod does work.

However, when I get in flight, my Flight Engineer is not always appearing.

I don't know why, but sometimes it does appear, and sometimes it doesn't.

Yesterday I updated the mod to the latest version because of the new update, and still it does not work. (I'm using my career savefile)

It's a really helpful tool that I can use to make real efficient missions with, so I'd appreciate it if someone could help me.

(Here a pic of in-game https://imgur.com/a/FswXFjh )

 

Thanks!
It will only show up, in flight, if you use the KER parts: the microchip and recorder looking parts.

14 hours ago, ItsSeanBroleson said:

It will only show up, in flight, if you use the KER parts: the microchip and recorder looking parts.

How do you mean? A microchip and recorder?

Edited October 19, 2018 by RubenKLR

15 hours ago, ItsSeanBroleson said:

It will only show up, in flight, if you use the KER parts: the microchip and recorder looking parts.

This^ or uppgrade your tracking station to level 3 or put an engineer in your ship (not quiet sure if there is a level requirement). IIRC there is also an option to make KER always available, you can check the settings in the editor
